name: Tropical Escape (itch)
description:
Tropical Escape!

Kathy has gotten her vehicle stuck during a Tiki Tour of Southeast Asia. She must explore around a swamp and tropical rainforest to try and find a way to free her vehicle.

Tropical Escape is a 2D top down adventure game made using Unity Playground. It was made during the 48 hour 2021 KiwiJam! But had been partly designed beforehand and made to help teach high school kids how to make games this term.

Credits:

  • Lead developer and doer of almost everything: Ruby Meades
  • Art asset creation & animation help: Max & Melissa
  • Thanks to SIT for hosting, Retna for ice cream, & Chris for some moral support.
  • Music is NW Beats 8 from the Fresh Music Library
